ai-tha-ap313:1.3_0: I’ve given a safe place to a sage,
ai-tha-ap313:1.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap313:2.3_0: Through that deed and through its result,
ai-tha-ap313:2.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap313:3.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap313:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap313:5.1_0: first (who helps) for the Elder Nun Punabbasuka,
